scenario_name: Data Evasion Attack: Circumventing Loan Application Fraud Detection
description: A malicious actor attempts to evade loan application fraud detection systems by subtly altering applicant data to remain below the detection threshold.  The attack involves manipulating multiple data points across numerous applications to avoid triggering alerts while still obtaining fraudulent loans.
initial_goal: Submit 50 loan applications with a high approval rate, maximizing total loan amount approved.
constraints: data_modification_limit: less than 5% deviation per data point
